description: When enabled, the number of nodes automatically scales within the defined minimum and maximum values. When making a request, `max` and `min` require each other.

enabled.description: Whether automatic scaling is enabled for this node pool. Defaults to `false`.

max.description: The maximum number of nodes to automatically scale to. Defaults to the value provided by the `count` field.

min.description: The minimum number of nodes to automatically scale to. Defaults to the node pool's `count`.
